thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 4 of 1692
thread.title: Donna

author: Donna
title: Donna
text:
I booked through many other online providers and had encountered poor customer service if there was a problem and I had to call in. It was also not uncommon to find the same ticket after booking on other sites for cheaper.
This is not my experience with Flight Hub.
This is my second time using this provider and for sure not the last.
Fast, efficient , cheapest tickets, and secure booking.
Thank you Flight Hub !
